captions.text:
The "Soundtrack Game"!
Dani and Bella will play.

In this game, they
will improvise a scene,

and every time Daniel Tauszig plays
a music, they will have to change

the style or the mood of
the scene they're doing.

Whenever the music stops, they will
have to return to their neutral state.

All right? To begin,
I'll pick from this orange box

a sentence that you wrote out there,
and that will be the theme of the sence.

The theme is:
'Your lips are epic'.

'Your lips are epic',
and go!

I called you because I saw the
reports you did today, Suzana,

- and the reports were very,
very, very... - Very, very...

- They were very, very...
- Very, very...
Above average!

I know! Because I studied
a lot to make them!

I dedicated myself day after day,
night after night, I barely slept!

I wan you to take these
reports and keep doing them.

- All right. - And I'd like to know
if you're doing tonight, if...

- The reports?
- Yeah, I don't know how you nail them...

- It depends.
- Depends on what, Suzana?
It depends...

Suzana, what's happening
to you? Suzana, look at me!
Suzana! Suzana!
Suzana! Suzana!
You want to talk to Suzana?
Who's in there?

Who? You know well.
It's me, Suzana!
I wanna know, who's in there?

You're very funny, Mr. Laerte,
I think you're funny...

Well, I'll go home now to be alone
and heat something in the microwave.
I can make a great fish!
If it is raw fish, I like it!
There's raw fish too!

Well, if you extend my deadline
on the reports, I can...
What can you do, Suzana?
I can make the report!

- A report with your soul! - My soul,
Suzana, why do you want my soul?

I'm giving you a raise, Suzana!
Stand straight, Suzana!
That was crazy!

Suzana, if you're not
getting my innuendo,

I guess you don't have a
place in this company, Suzana!

I undesrtood your innuendo
and I was showing you

a new Kama Sutra position,
if you didn't get it.

That's because I was paying
attention to something else!
On what?
On your lips, Suzana!

The lips are the most
important part of our bodies!

That's why we must always
brush and floss our teeth!

It's through our lips that
we eat, to get big and strong!
Well, then...
I'll meet you at... Eight.

- Eight o'clock is too late!
- Seven?

- Seven o'clock is too soon!
- Seven thirty!

Seven thirty is neither
late nor soon, Suzana!
It's the perfect time, Suzana!

It's the goddamn perfect time,
Suzana!

- Don't yell at me! - I yell when
I'm completely in love, Suzana!
My God... Then kiss me!

Calm down, Suzana!
I don't want anything serious!

- I want to have your babies!
- No! I just wanted to make out!
"Soundtrack Game"!
Daniel Tauszig and the couple killed it!
What a Kama Sutra position, guys!

When she talked about
Kama Sutra, I thought
Geez, I'm glad we're PG-13...

CIA. BARBIXAS DE HUMOR
presented

IMPROVÁVEL
Probably a good show.
